00011 #include <unordered_map>

00013 #include <string>
00014 #include <string_view>
00015 #include <stdexcept>
00016 #include <utility>

00018 namespace hope {
00019 
00020     template <typename ReturnType,
00021                typename NameClass = std::string_view>
00022     class factory final {
00023         using creator_map = std::unordered_map<NameClass, std::function<ReturnType*()>>;
00024     public:
00025         factory() = default;
00026         factory(const factory&) = delete;
00027         factory& operator=(const factory&) = delete;
00028         ~factory() = default;
00029 
00030         template <typename Type>
00031         bool register_object(NameClass name) {
00032             if (creators.count(name) != 0)
00033                 throw std::runtime_error(std::string("An attempt was made to register already registered type with name: ") + typeid(Type).name());
00034             creators.emplace(std::move(name), [] { return new Type; });
00035             return true;
00036         }
00037 
00038         [[nodiscard]] ReturnType* create(const NameClass& name) const {
00039             const auto creatorIt = creators.find(name);
00040             if (creatorIt == std::cend(creators))
00041                 throw std::runtime_error(std::string("Unregistered typename passed to factory of type: ")
00042                     + typeid(ReturnType).name());
00043             return creatorIt->second();
00044         }
00045 
00046     private:
00047         creator_map creators;
00048     };
00049 }
